title: Lautrec
creator_credit: Geoff Dunbar, Dragon Productions and British Film Institute
brief_description: Some of the more familiar Lautrec subjects are expertly animated in a graphic style. By the means of clever animation, Geoff Dunbar creates a personal study of this famous French artist.
